alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 2:56PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF UNCOMPAHGRE PLATEAU/DALLAS DIVIDE AND GRAND VALLEY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 255 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Fruita to 16 miles southwest of Grand Junction and moving east at 35 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Fruita around 310 PM MST. Grand Junction around 320 PM MST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado near mile marker 21. Colorado 141 near mile marker 122. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
